getEndpointAddresses

public static java.util.Collection<net.jxta.endpoint.EndpointAddress> getEndpointAddresses(net.jxta.protocol.PeerAdvertisement peerAdv)
Returns the endpoint address of a peer advertisement.

Parameters:
peerAdv - the peer advertisement for which the endpoint address shall be delivered
Returns:
the endpoint address

simpleGroupJoin

public static void simpleGroupJoin(net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup peerGroup)
                            throws net.jxta.exception.PeerGroupException,
                                   net.jxta.exception.ProtocolNotSupportedException
Does a simple group join without any authentication.

Parameters:
peerGroup - the peer group that shall be joined
Throws:
net.jxta.exception.PeerGroupException
net.jxta.exception.ProtocolNotSupportedException

instantiateERTIPeerGroup

public static net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup instantiateERTIPeerGroup(net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup netPeerGroup,
                                                                    java.lang.String ertiGroupId)
                                                             throws net.jxta.exception.PeerGroupException,
                                                                    java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                    java.lang.Exception
Instantiates and returns the ERTI peer group. The erti peer group name is: "org.eodisp.erti.ertiPeerGroup". The peer group description is: "The ERTI peer group to which all ERTI peers belong to"

Parameters:
netPeerGroup - the parent group
ertiGroupId - the group id of the new ERTI peer group
Returns:
the ERTI peer group
Throws:
net.jxta.exception.PeerGroupException - If something went wrong during the group instantiation
java.net.URISyntaxException - If the given ertiGroupId is not a valid URI.
java.lang.Exception

saveAdvertisement

public static void saveAdvertisement(net.jxta.document.Advertisement adv,
                                     java.io.File file)
Use for tests only! Does not throw any exceptions for convenience.

Parameters:
adv - the advertisement
file - the file the advertisement should be saved to

getComputerName

public static java.lang.String getComputerName()
Returns the local computer name.

Returns:
the name of the computer the JVM is running on or unknown if can't be determined.

getERTISocketPipeAdvertisement

public static net.jxta.protocol.PipeAdvertisement getERTISocketPipeAdvertisement(net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup ertiPeerGroup)
Returns the pipe advertisement for the server component.

Parameters:
ertiPeerGroup - the peer group the created pipe belongs to.
Returns:
the pipe advertisements for the server component of the network.

the ERTI Net Peer Group
